service: fans-at-chico-state-api

frameworkVersion: '4'

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs20.x
  region: us-west-1
  memorySize: 521
  timeout: 30
  stage: ${opt:stage, 'dev'}

  environment:
    # Passed in from deployment environment; used by src/lambda.js
    SECRETS_ID: ${env:SECRETS_ID}

  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - secretsmanager:GetSecretValue
          Resource:
            # Grant access only to the configured secret
            - arn:aws:secretsmanager:${self:provider.region}:*:secret:${env:SECRETS_ID}*

  httpApi:
    cors:
      allowedOrigins:
        # TODO: replace with your actual Amplify app origin, e.g. https://main.d123abc456def.amplifyapp.com
        - https://your-amplify-app-origin.example.com
        - https://localhost:5173
        - https://main.d2qxbewq57vyhq.amplifyapp.com
      allowedMethods:
        - GET
        - POST
        - PUT
        - PATCH
        - DELETE
        - OPTIONS
      allowedHeaders:
        - Content-Type
        - Authorization
        - X-Requested-With
      allowCredentials: true

functions:
  api:
    handler: src/lambda.handler
    events:
      - httpApi:
          method: '*'
          path: '/{proxy+}'

plugins:
  - serverless-offline

package:
  individually: false
  patterns:
    # Include the root OpenAPI file in the deployment package
    - ../fans_chico_openapi.yaml
